definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: A fly alighted on her cracked lips, and I brushed it away.
sentences.chinese: 一隻蒼蠅落在她乾裂的嘴脣上，我轟走了它。

sentences.english: If you want to save money, you can also drive the director away on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 如果想省錢，導演也可以當場轟走。

sentences.english: He could get rid of them now.
sentences.chinese: 他現在可以把他們轟走了。

sentences.english: The audience hooted down that speaker.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆將那個演說者轟走了。

sentences.english: Nosering, think the price is too high, serve immediately go three people.
sentences.chinese: 老管家認爲價錢太高，當即要轟走三人。

sentences.english: Ling smoke to his face, rid of minister Lin Tang Shaoxiong.
sentences.chinese: 凌煙給足了自己面子，林部長轟走了唐紹雄。

sentences.english: He worked the bus terminal for a few days until they chased him.
sentences.chinese: 他在公共汽車終點鬼混了幾天，最後被人家轟走了。
